Blog.post: Pain why do I exist, on my own it hurts like a fragmented bone The worst black nightmare I scream blue Without your touch I feel untrue I need your touch, for this I dream I need your soul, to hold you near. with you near, my soul will beam without you here, my soul does tear I know you are the one for me to be with you, will set me free life is not life, without you here and to lose you, my greatest fear.
When i love you And you love me You make my heart turn to gold You make my time with you golden Our love is a gold crown And when I am with you Time stops
From the rising of the sun To the rising of the moon I wish i was with you From the dreams of my sleep To the thoughts of my days always are of you

I dream of the day of glorious you Like a goddess, my dreams worship Such beauty, men lose their breath your green eyes makes me frozen your brown hair, like flowing silk such soft words, they float and stun your ambient air of love entraps me intoxication, liberation, purification my soul is free, my heart complete to be complete with you, a dream

Each breath i take Is a breath for you Each thought i make Is a thought for you every pain and ache is from missing you Every dream i take Is a dream of you every move i make is a move for you every time i love it is love for you

water washes with water like my soul with yours mixing, into a glorious sea filled by rivers of feelings and tears of joy stirring a passionate storm that gives the sea a heartbeat as the waves slide together into a brilliant calm
I told the river i loved you the river rippled to the sea the sea whispered to sky and the sky wept tears of joy

If my love for you was a stone It is the strongest stone It is the richest stone It is the most beautiful stone It is not a ruby It is not even a diamond But a stone of pure love for that is what you deserve It is unseeable by man It is uncreatable by the gods And I give this stone to you as part of my love

walking in the fields of bliss in the plains of tranquilty I noticed your flower the scent of your love that made me grow roots that mixed with your roots stalks growing together stalks wrapping round and bonding forever

When I look at you My breath turns to perfume My soul springs from the desert Roses spring from the heart When I love you The deserts have rain Flowers bloom, birds sing I was in pain before When I touch you Sand turns to silk souls merge together and together we sink into The sea of silk
Force If my love for you could be converted, into another force it would turn the tide and stop the yangtze

How I desire my sweet red wine And how you make me feel The wine tasted from your lips to touch and feel your neck to feel your full body to merge as one drunk from your presence happy from our harmony How I desire my sweet red wine

I sit and cry, your soul is missing Nothing to touch, nothing to feel You are so far away, like gold from the rainbow, from eldorado shadows before me Glimpses behind me I hold my head in dispair sad that you, are not here like a frame with no picture I hang my sorry head wishing for your touch like the pollen needs the wind

Want I need to feel your love Like the wind feels the trees to feel your warmth like leaves feel the sun to feel your soul like the ghosts of ancient lovers to feel your loving touch Like the sea strokes the sand to feel complete like two perfect souls in embrace, forever.

Leaves Words for you are not enough cliche written words of love The words I want for you are greater than love itself If I say, I love you These words are like a leaf in a forest, I want to give you a tree I want to give you the forest My words fail me My love for you is a forest

Spring when our hearts first spoke The sleepy sun it awoke which pulled back the grey curtains causing tears from the mountains which made the trees grow to the sky this made the weeping willows cry this made the rabbits bound the birds sing beautiful sound young deer come to play That chase the grey days away all this growth, love and life when our hearts first spoke

Her reflection, gazes at her, in tribute to her admiration she wants, but she cannot have tempted, by that on display longing to have, like the apple her face floats, over glass ice Ghosting from view to view on a grey sunday afternoon Walking with windows
I am the flower Your smile is the wind Your love is the earth Your soul is the light I am the flower - without Earth, wind and light I am nothing

I dream of you and me under the cherry trees in full spring glory can you take me there? And love me there? to live in your eyes and sleep in your heart trees blossoming us in their crowing glory to be with you forever like the oyster with the pearl

If I were, born a bird of my love, I would sing of my hopes, I would dream of life, i would give for you. Of search for you, i would go to fly over river and vale to glide over mountain and rock to hover over desert and sand to sail against tempest and tide to sing of my love to you

I flip another coin Into the well wishing you were here too long i have done this day after day week after week month after month sad time spent alone each day a lonely heart throwing another coin into the deep black well listening, watching it fall never hitting the bottom like these days never end
when I see the letters you send to me I forget the paper I forget the pen and I dance with the words when I see your eyes looking at me I forget the sky I forget the earth and I dance with your soul

My words fail you for when i say you are beautiful I mean to say a whole lot more for you deserve a whole new language for when i look at you rome is built in a day and the gods found new words of love in their forgery for these are the words I would give to you
the wall fell and we kissed this felt like reaching the life giving oasis at the end of the desert
